oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-03-17 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 17, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Martha Carson, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chubby Wise, Tommy Jackson, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Rod Brasfield; Martha Carson; Chubby Wise; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Hank Snow -- I'm Moving On (Hank Snow) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Martha Carson -- I Want To Rest A Little While (Martha Carson) -- Hank Snow introduces Chubby Wise and Tommy Jackson -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Chubby Wise fiddle, Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Hank Snow talks -- I Just Telephone Upstairs (Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert jingle (Hank Snow)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Jackson, Tommy; Wise, Chubby; Snow, Hank; Carson, Martha
